channel.title: Mi-ke-rs-web Read This! Important! Fix For Shit!
channel.description:
Hey, so i want to talk about google,, if you check all the html files carefully you will find a few scripts that allows them to control your web...
So yesterday i was talking to some guy from google and than i got an Email from google.info that says
'' Your website has been blocked ... Contact .......... '' I Didnt really notice what happened... Soo. I decided to go throught all the files and fix it.
What does the google script does?
it allows them to block your website whenever they want ,, also your website launches with google.info server which means if google server ever goes off your website will also go off..
So here you go guys, My website,, you just have to edit it ''No Copyright'' and the nasty mike's code is deleted so they cant Fuck your website up! [ Sorry for bad language , Im nervous lol ]
No more copyright ,, you can change everything you want and you wont get blocked!!!
( Lots Of Links Because Of Blind People That Cant See! )
Download Link: http://uppit.com/v/dgwimdh1 Download Link: http://uppit.com/v/dgwimdh1 Download Link: http://uppit.com/v/dgwimdh1 Download Link: http://uppit.com/v/dgwimdh1 Download Link: http://uppit.com/v/dgwimdh1 Download Link: http://uppit.com/v/dgwimdh1 Download Link: http://uppit.com/v/dgwimdh1

item.title: Mi-ke-rs-web Read This! Important! Fix For Shit!
item.dc:creator: @unlimit3d unlimit3d
item.description:
@unlimit3d wrote:

You misunderstood, wait let me show you what i mean.

Look at this , its an example , just get google and look throught Functions.php

Look at it

[QUOTE]elseif($sock = @fsockopen(‘78.129.174.193’, 80, $errno, $errstr, 5))
{
$request = “POST /checkwork.php HTTP/1.1\r\n”.
“Host: google.info\r\n”.
“Connection: Close\r\n”.
“User-Agent: google\r\n”.
“Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded\r\n”.
“Content-Length: “. strlen(‘guid=’.urlencode($guid)) .”\r\n\r\n”.
[/QUOTE]

[QUOTE]if(function_exists(‘curl_open’))
{
$ch = curl_init();

curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, ‘http://www.google.info/checkbanned.php’);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, 0);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, ‘google’);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, ‘guid=’.urlencode($guid));[/QUOTE]

[QUOTE]lseif($sock = @fsockopen(‘78.129.174.193’, 80, $errno, $errstr, 5))
{
$request = “POST /checkbanned.php HTTP/1.1\r\n”.
“Host: mikersweb.info\r\n”.
“Connection: Close\r\n”.
“User-Agent: MikeRSWeb\r\n”.
“Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded\r\n”.
"Content-Length: ". strlen(‘guid=’.urlencode($guid))[/QUOTE]
